choose.when: select dc.*, d.dept_title from department_calendar dc join dept d on dc.dept_code = d.dept_code order by dc.calendar_seq
choose.otherwise: select dc.*, d.dept_title from department_calendar dc join dept d on dc.dept_code = d.dept_code join employee e on dc.dept_code = e.dept_code where e.emp_no = #{empNo} order by dc.calendar_seq

mapper.select: select count(*) from personal_calendar where calendar_seq = #{calendarSeq}
